org.jclouds.vcloud.director.v1_5.features.admin

Interface AdminOrgClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OrgClient

    public interface AdminOrgClient
extends OrgClient
    Provides synchronous access to Org objects.
    Author:
    danikov
    See Also:
    GroupAsyncClient

    • Method Detail

      • getOrg

        AdminOrg getOrg(URI orgRef)
        Retrieves an admin view of an organization. The organization might be enabled or disabled. If enabled, the organization allows login and all other operations. 
         GET /admin/org/{id}
        Specified by:
        getOrg in interface OrgClient
        Parameters:
        orgRef - the reference for the admin org
        Returns:
        the admin org
